name: Animal Vegetable Mineral
description:
Animal Vegetable Mineral is a version of an 'after dinner' game in which players have to guess a mystery object by asking questions to which the answer is either Yes or No.

In this game the player thinks of an object and the game tries to guess it. The game comes with a very limited range of items, 'knowing' just two objects in each category. When the player submits an item the game does not have in its database the player is asked how the new item differs from the best answer the game could give. This information is then stored and so the game's repertoire grows.

The game allows the player to review, edit, and store the database.

shot.caption: The game load screen. Note the long, long load time for such a simple game
The game starts here. Guessing begins after the players name has been entered. I guess this is so that other players know who taught the game the rude words.
This is the only question for which the answer is not Yes or No. I'm going to see if it can guess the word LEAF, so the answer here is 2 - Vegetable
The game then responds with a question that differentiates between items it knows about. Here I'm saying Yes because its spring and the leaf I'm looking at is green
Good call! Grass is green and I suppose it's made up of leaves but my leaf is on a tree so I'll answer NO to this
The game concedes defeat. Had it a more extensive vocabulary it would ask more questions before it gave up. This is where the player teaches the game a new word.
Having taught the game a new word the player then tells it what question to ask to differentiate between Leaf & Grass since both are vegetable and Green
The game's database has now been expanded. I'm playing again and this time I'm going with the word EAGLE
The game always gives the player(s) time to think of a word
This was a genuine surprise! The game only knows two animals and one of them was EAGLE. It plays a short happy tune when it gets one right
This screen shot is from database update function (option 6 from the main menu) which allows the player to correct existing entries
